description:
Nami’s plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed celestial dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Fist Explodes! Destroy the Auction
Un coup de poing explosif ! Une vente aux enchères à massacrer
Рвущийся в бой кулак! Уничтожить аукцион!
鉄拳炸裂! オークションをぶっつぶせ
